snippet: Mary Cain, one of the most promising female American high school middle-distance runners in decades, has chosen to turn professional rather than run for a collegiate team.
abstract: Mary Cain, one of the most promising female American high school middle-distance runners in decades, decides to turn professional rather than run for a collegiate team.
lead_paragraph: Mary Cain, one of the most promising female American high school middle-distance runners in decades, has chosen to turn professional rather than run for a collegiate team.

headline.main: Top Teenage Runner Is Turning Pro
